title: The French lieutenant's woman
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Love
description: Based on the brilliant novel by John Fowles and with a screenplay written by Harold Pinter, 'The French Lieutenant's woman' is at once a classic Victorian love story and an ironic look at an age of double-standard morality. Sarah Woodruff's chance meeting with Charles Smithson, a young man-about-town who subsequently discards his pretty young fiancee in a wave of passion, sets in motion a series of events that disrupts the quiet fishing and seaside village in England and profoundly affects the lives of its residents. Cast includes Meryl Streep and Jeremy Irons.
